releaseNotes: Hello, we have bugs fixed for this version. Hope you enjoy!
description:
Chat Smith, developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o delivers enhanced AI Chat app capabilities, voice interaction, write email, solve math homework, image generator, and intelligent conversational experience for all your needs. You can enjoy a personalized experience with AI Chatbot Chat Smith as your assistant available on your iOS device.

Our AI assistant chatbot Chat Smith can do many tasks with endless possibilities:

GIVE INSTANT ANSWERS
Thanks to powerful latest AI model, Chat Smith built on GPT-4 can give your prompt, impressive answers to any questions based on existing knowledge. 

AI WRITING ASSISTANT
AI-powered writing assistant feature helps to tackle any writing tasks with ease:
- Write outlines for any essays, or compose entire paragraphs.
- Write anything, any styles: tweets, emails, essays, chat responses, SEO content, meta descriptions, ad copy, social media caption
- Turn a product discription into ad copies, generate product name

UNLEASH CREATIVIVE POTENTIALS
Creating a poem, music & song lyrics, brainstorming ideas for proposals, reasearching, thesis

PDF MASTER
Effortlessly summarize, rewrite, or translate any PDF document. Ask any question about the document's content, and receive instant answers.

YOUTUBE PRO
Understand YouTube videos instantly. Paste a video URL, and the app will provide summaries, rewrites, translations, and answers to your questions about the video's content.

AI KEYBOARD
Enhance your writing, generate text directly from your devices & craft any responses - all without leaving your current app

PRACTICE ANY LANGUAGES
Translate standard English text into any languages you want with multilingual capabilities

ESTABLISH AUTHENTICITY
Basic prompt for detecting sentiment like tweet classifier, or fill your writing with genuine emotion, personality

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER
Quickly correct grammatical, spelling, and punctuation mistakes in your standard English text.

EXPERT TEXT STRUCTURE & SUMMARIZER
Expert Summarizer simplifies complex text, turning meeting notes or lengthy content into clear, concise summaries with key insights and natural flow.

CODE GURU
AI-powered code generator, debugger, and API assistant. Transform natural language into functional code—Stripe, Chatbot APIs, and more

CV BUILDER
Craft a professional resume and cover letter, or standout Linkedin profile that will showcase your skills, experience, and achievements. Plus, Ai Chatbot Chat Smith can attract quality candidates by creating unique interview questions.

SMART SPEECHWRITER
Whether you’re giving a speech at a business conference, or a school presentation, the app help you deliver a powerful, memorable message with analogy maker feature that will captivate, inspire your audience.

STUDY ADVISOR
All you need is to provide a topic, AI Chatbot Chat Smith will craft you easy-to-remember study notes. You can also get help or advise for homework, get your math homework solve from AI

You can choose to subscribe to our auto-renewing subscriptions:
• User can subscribe one week (USD 6.99$) or one month (USD 9.99$) or one year (USD 69.99$). After the free trial, the total amount for the subscription will be charged to your iTunes Account. The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal at the total subscription price within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited after purchase. Special introductory offers only apply to the first billing term. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed or canceled via your iTunes Account settings: Setting > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > manage subscription after purchase.

We’d love to receive your feedback to improve our app.
Terms of Use: http://vulcanlabs.co/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://vulcanlabs.co/privacy-policy/
Contact Us: support@vulcanlabs.co
